page.title: 11EAST GRINSTEAD SOUTH WEST
page.content: This area consists of roughly 90% open countryside, the remainder being the builtup area of the south west quadrant of the town. The countryside is medium quality farmland.It is attractive, being part of the High Weald area of outstanding natural beauty and includes the National Trust house & gardens at Standen. The builtup area is mostly modern housing estates but includes the older properties along Ship St & Dunnings Rd and ,most importantly, the ancient & picturesque High St (qv). The town has a rail link to London & many of its residents are commuters. Bus services to and from the High St are alsom fairly comprehensive. It is a wealthy area in general, umemployment is low, and home ownership the norm.The people are insulated from economic & environmental hardship.
